name: Spicy Cheesy Refried Beans
author: Challengergurl
summary: These refried beans are spiced up with garlic, onions, and cream cheese. I serve this as a side dish when we have tacos.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can spicy fat-free refried beans
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir onion and garlic until onion becomes translucent, 2 to 3 minutes
Cook and stir refried beans into onion mixture until heated through, 3 to 5 minutes
Remove from heat and stir cream cheese into bean mixture
Spread mixture into a pie plate; top with Cheddar cheese
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and bubbling, about 20 minutes
